subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Testosterone
Tests and Testing
Laboratories and Scientific Equipment
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tests showed that some of the testosterone in Floyd Landis’s body came from an external source, according to a person with knowledge of the results.
snippet: Tests showed that some of the testosterone in Floyd Landis’s body came from an external source, according to a person with knowledge of the results.
